title: Example Clue Title

text.base: OBJECTIVE DESCRIPTION: What the clue IS, physically. A torn letter. A photograph. A bloodstain.

lens.believer: BELIEVER READING: What supernatural meaning might this have?
lens.skeptic: SKEPTIC READING: What rational explanation fits?
lens.haunted: HAUNTED READING: What personal connection might the player have?

_writing_notes.base_guidance: Be specific but not conclusive. 'A torn letter' not 'proof of conspiracy'
_writing_notes.lens_guidance: Each lens interprets the SAME physical clue differently
